title: A Murder Spells Trouble
description: The Secrets in Shadow Lake Run Deep... Nobody but a chosen few know the real history of the town, or what lies beneath the still surface of the lake...As members of the Kilorian Coven, Addie and her two sisters, Kiera and Willow, were born to the use of magic. Together the three are the sworn protectors of Shadow Lake, tasked with keeping evil at bay and the townsfolk safe.When a dead body is found on Luna Moth Trail Addie is forced to get involved after a strange woman begs her for help.The first officer on scene is the enigmatic Detective Lucian Knight who seems to be more than he appears. He reveals to her that the murder isn't the only incident that has occurred in town recently.With the mysteries piling up, could there be something greater at work in Shadow Lake?Will Addie and her sisters be able to solve the murder and keep the town safe?
author: K.J. Emrick
